channel.title: Finalrun Studio
channel.description: Most recent updates to Finalrun Studio

item.title: Version 0.1.22
item.description:
• Complete desktop app automation system implemented
• Added notarization support for macOS distribution
• Integrated auto-updater functionality with EdDSA signatures
• Improved release process with GitHub integration • Enhanced security with proper code signing
• Production environment configuration support
• Automated appcast.xml generation and deployment
• Bug fixes and performance improvements
